response_parsed.title: Documenting REST APIs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive overview of how to document REST APIs using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+
It includes automatic generation of OpenAPI documentation and supports multiple formats like JSON, YAML, and HTML
FastAPI's powerful type system makes it easy to write self-documenting code
It offers features like route level authorization, middleware, and more out-of-the-box
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.72.0 or higher is required for Python 3.12+ compatibility
FastAPI v0.80.0 introduces the ORJSONResponse, an optimized JSON response class
caveats: FastAPI's built-in documentation generation relies on type annotations and Pydantic models for accuracy
Some extensions or plugins may not be compatible with FastAPI's latest version, so ensure compatibility before use
